programme.title: Thomas Paine and the uprisings in Czechoslovakia and Hungary
programme.short_synopsis: Why is President George Bush so reluctant to comment on the uprising in Hungary?
programme.medium_synopsis: A profile of American revolutionary Thomas Paine, the rebellions in Czechoslovakia and Hungary, and President Bush's reluctance to comment on the uprisings.
